meanings.definition: A person who predicts or believes in the imminent destruction or end of the world.
meanings.sent1: The doomsdayers warned everyone about the end of the world.
meanings.sent2: Many doomsdayers believe that the world will end soon.
meanings.sent3: The doomsdayers' predictions made for an interesting conversation.
meanings.sent4: The doomsdayers' warnings painted a grim picture of the future.
meanings.sent5: The doomsdayers' beliefs were filled with fear and uncertainty.

meanings.definition: Those who advocate or promote apocalyptic or catastrophic scenarios.
meanings.sent1: The doomsdayers spread alarming stories of catastrophe.
meanings.sent2: Some doomsdayers actively promote apocalyptic scenarios.
meanings.sent3: The doomsdayers' advocacy for disaster scenarios was intense.
meanings.sent4: The doomsdayers' promotion of catastrophic events was unsettling.
meanings.sent5: The doomsdayers' advocacy for apocalyptic scenarios was relentless.
